properties.Observatio: There are large trees at some places on both sides of the bank. But banks are eroded. Too much water flows in rainy season. In some places, small amounts of garbage have been dumped into streams, and in some places, reserved lands are being misused.
properties.Descript_1:
Arrange stone packing-rubble packing-to prevent bank erosion

Vegetative cover improving along the river banks Areca nut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna randomly mixed seedling and planti
